module.name: muihelper
module.short: Helper function to create MUI applications

descr.p: A helper unit make it possible to create MUI application in the same way as you would in C (and MUI examples are written). C provides macros for this purpose. For Free Pascal this unit provides wrapper functions with the same name as the C define but with prefix "MH_".

element.name: ButtonFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a button like Frame

element.name: ImageButtonFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a image button like Frame

element.name: TextFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a text frame

element.name: StringFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a string gadget frame

element.name: ReadListFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a read only list frame

element.name: InputListFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a list frame

element.name: PropFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a propprtional gadget frame

element.name: SliderFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a slider frame

element.name: GaugeFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a gague frame

element.name: VirtualFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a virtual frame

element.name: GroupFrame
element.short: Frame type, draw a grouop box frame

element.name: Child
element.short: Adding Child items to Group objects

element.name: WindowContents
element.short: Adding main Object to Window object
